title: Duke Global Mental Health Conference 2024
text: The Duke Center for Global Mental Health is excited to invite you to our first Duke Global Mental Health Conference on October 8, 2024, located on the Trent Semans Center 6th floor. Our theme is: Building a Global Mental Health Community: Research, Policy, and Practice Across Disciplines. This one-day event will bring together leaders, researchers, practitioners, and advocates from the Duke community and our partners around the world to share our work and ideas for working together.

title: Duke Global Mental Health Conference 2024
text:
Key Details

WHEN: October 8, 2024, 8:30am-5:00pm


WHERE: Trent Semans Center (6th floor) and virtual

title: Duke Global Mental Health Conference 2024
text:
Register
Please register here. This is a hybrid event. In-person registration is open until Oct 3. Virtual registration is open until Oct 6.
